name: Digger Online
description: Sanbox multiplayer building game with additional game mods
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 2 ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Vidia GeForce 5900 со 128 МБ видеопамяти / AMD Radeon 9600 XT со 128 МБ видеопамяти DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: совместимая с DirectX 9

reviews.review_text: This game is not for Steam.
It's okay.  Pros: Not the worst game ever. Average. Emotes kind of amusing.  Cons: Micro-Transactions for every additional object. Average. If your playing this your not playing Minecraft.

This game is not a good one by anymeans. This was exuseable when the game was free. But, it's currently 10 dollars. This game is not worth any of that. 1: The entire game is in pretty much russian. Any and all servers you go to will have russian players. You will have no clue what they're even saying. Which hurts a english speaker such as myself. 2: Minecraft clone, It's not even a medicore Minecraft Clone such as Block Story. 3: The game is way to confusing for new players. All the help you will recive is in Russian. Meaning if you can't read russian, your going to have to play the game to figure out this game's controls. 4: Getting into a server with your friends is impossiable. This game doesn't have Steam invites or Steam joining. Which also means no VAC. Which means hackers. 5: The free to play mechinics. Need I say more?  All in all, this game isn't worth 10 dollars. Heck, H1Z1 will give more play time than this piece of broken programming. So, DO NOT SPEND 10 DOLLARS ON THIS GAME. Save it. Buy yourself a actualy GOOD game.

If you are looking for a free version of Minecraft this is NOT it I mean really not.  Most of the UI is in Russian with one of two words with picture for you to work it out for your self.  So I hit some rocks and trees find I don’t get any materials for it and got to PAY for ALL building stuffs, not only requiring you to buy what the item looks like but also stair, slab and slop forms you have to buy access to.  wow you can make your own map that you can see from one end to the other if you want to make some thing bigger tough you can with out paying this map is also randomly generated, you have no say on if it has hills or trees unless you buy the flat map.   want a desert or snowy map yes you guessed it pay up for that to oh and you want a 2nd map to play with your friends that will be another payment.   so no I would not recommend that to any one wanting a free Minecraft I would suggest saving up and buying Minecraft.

I didn't play much but I managed to play enough. Pros: 1: It's a small file ( Takes no time to download and install and none to be deleted) 2: It's a poor man's Minecraft (Free) 3: It's good for new or young gamers and can introduce them to the sandbox genre.  Cons... 1: The games menus are hard to navigate due to the menus being in russian. (This can be changed) 2: Even on the english setting the instructions are in russian 3: It's hard to build anything due to a lack of 'Nerd Poleing'  Conclusion... It is a good game for a New gamer who has limited funds or is new to the P.C however is limited due to microtransactions for items and the menus being in russian at heart. This would be a great game with the following proposals: 1: Translate the instructions and place them under a controls tab. 2: Add more variation to the starter blocks and make the blocks you have to pay for free but hard to aquire 3: I am unsure if the feature was in place at the time of my review but perhaps add a free flying ability 4: Something to set it apart from the other block placing games like customizable vehicles or even a more exploration based theme. I know that game development is hard, especially in small groups but I believe that with some fine tuning this game could be a winner. The only improvement I can suggest that I truly hope makes it, eventually, into the game is that it takes a step away from minecraft and loses the blocky charm in favour of a more rounded theme just to give it some edge over the competition. Overall it is a fun game with only a few small issues and is fun to play alone or with friends. I give it a 2.5/5 so your half way there. Keep up the hard work and I hope you take my reconmendations on board, Nuke_Dwarf_

I dont really like the game as it is, its to vanilla when you start and you only start out with a few blocks wood, stone, nature tabs and theres only about 5 each. 'ok well are there other blocks you can get? Yes there different blocks!!! oh, wait you have to buy them with coins and only for 1 day, 5 days, and permanant? ok i will get them permanently. . . hmm thats alot of coins for it though 2000+. Ok well i just need to get more coins! but. . . how do i get coins? *check settings* theres no controls list??? ok maybe they have them on the screen. . . no still no list? odd well i guys i will just ask around. . . wait why are so many people talking in russian? ok well i guess i will find out. . . *goes into my worlds* wait. . . i have to spend gold to have my world??? hmm ok #worthit i guess right? *spawns in* ok now now im in my world wait how do i control things again? oh right i dont know.' and scene so yeah you dont really know any key bindings or anything when you get in and is more of a pay to play type deal, im sorry I cannot recommend this game.

I do NOT reccomend this game  Graphics -  7/10 From far away, they look okay because you don't see the serious pixels. But from close up, it looks like crap Music- 0/10 THERE IS NONE. NO SERIOUSLY, NO MUSIC. Sound Effects- 8/10  They are actually pretty decent, the sound effects fit and they sound okay Community- 2/10 It's crap, people destory your buildings, spam, and just act like ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥s Some problems- First, let's start off with language, this is a problem, because i set my language to ENGLISH BUT EVERYTHING ELSE SOME OTHER LANGUAGE I HAVE NO ♥♥♥♥ING IDEA WHAT IT IS. Second, the game doesn't even tell you everything, there is a bunch of other stuff you can do, like talk or some ♥♥♥♥. And finally, it's boring. This is because A- All the other 'Fun' minigames has severs with NOBODY playing in then (Execpt for one or something) B- The commnutity is ♥♥♥♥ (like i said before) C- You need to buy like 70% of everything in the store to make a good inside of a house, which is hard considering the game doesn't even give you ways to even GET MONEY.  This, this game is horrible. Don't even click that 'Download' button  Overall, in total, this game get's a 4/10.
